reuters.title: DALLAS INVESTOR CUTS STAKE IN MCDERMOTT (MDR)
reuters.body: A group led by Dallas investor Harold Simmons told the Securities and Exchange Commission it had reduced its stake in McDermott International Inc by one pct, to under five pct. The group had said in a March 10 filing, announcing acquisition of 5.4 pct of the firm's stock, that it might consider seeking control of the company. Reuter 
